overview:
Started in 1993, Stellar Information Systems Ltd, almost two decade old now, is a paramount data recovery software service provider for line of various Operating System including the Windows, Mac OS X and Linux. The organization was primarily formed by three enthusiastic technocrats whose sole aims were to provide the easiest measures of recovery software tools & applications for the end-users. With the first software made to recover data from a floppy drive, Stellar now has range of data recovery products which covers up the major operating systems, databases and e-mail clients. The company has a deep presence in India and other continents as well. The company stretches itself along the countries of Asia, North America, Europe and South-East Asia.

*Key Founder: - Sunil Chandna, Manoj Dhingra, and Kuljeet Singh.

The company’s brand popularity can be estimated by the only fact that it sustained more than 1 million delighted customers during the past working years and the database of client’s appends top brands as well as single users.

Mission & objective: SISL mission’s is clear and simple to bring forward sophisticated and interactive data recovery software and solutions for the users ensuring complete satisfaction through recovery of every single piece of lost, deleted or formatted data, password regain and system back-up, maintenance. Sunil Chandna, the CEO brings in light, ‘SISL competes in the fast changing techno world by continuously updating itself on the various technical platforms. He adds further, to achieve the objective we need to follow by a well-structured map for its core departments to work along-side resulting in delivering cutting-edge data recovery software and solutions.

SISL Facility:Beside the data recovery software and services, Stellar owns “Class 100 Clean Rooms” facility in the regions of Asia, USA and Europe to recover data from physically damaged hard drives. The company provides 24*5 technical assistance to its client bases.

SISL Trust: Being an ISO 9001:2008 certified organization and two consecutive times “Microsoft Gold Partner”, SISL has build up huge trust among the customers in less than expected time.

SISL Data Recovery software offerings:The major line of products relates to data recovery software for various versions of Windows OS, Mac OS, Linux, databases, email & password recovery, file repair and system maintenance utility.
